rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with tactile floor transitions, ramps for wheelchair access, natural lighting with Vastu-aligned door placement.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space with Kerala-style woodwork and decorative elements. Large window openings facing east as per Vastu principles for auspicious light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, with a view of the garden, ensuring calm energy flows and ease of wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with barrier-free design. Positioned in the southeast as per Vastu for positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip surfaces, ensuring safety and adherence to accessibility norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Bachelor Pad Focus)
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom in the northeast quadrant for prosperity; includes built-in storage and space for wheelchair maneuverability.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wide door with ramp for wheelchair accessibility, ensuring ease of entry as per local building norms.

openings.name: Window Opening 1 (Living Room)
openings.description: Large window to allow maximum morning sunlight, aligning with Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Window Opening 2 (Kitchen)
openings.description: Window to provide natural light and ventilation in the kitchen area as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: Accessible door to service areas and garden access, with ramp integration where needed.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Expansive master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, incorporating Kerala style elements and accessible fixtures.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest room designed for occasional stay; features barrier-free design and window openings on the south face for ventilation as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom with accessible layout, ensuring easy navigation for wheelchair users.

openings.name: Balcony Access Door
openings.location: East face of master bedroom suite
openings.description: Provides access to the balcony with a view of the garden, enhancing aesthetics and ventilation.

notes.vastu_considerations: Key elements such as main entrance on the south, living area in the east for sunlight, kitchen in southeast for positive energy, and bedrooms placed in northeast are aligned with Vastu principles.
notes.irregular_plot_design: The design adapts to an irregular plot by zoning the bungalow into functional areas that maximize space while integrating a large garden. The layout respects local building norms.
notes.accessibility_features: All levels incorporate wheelchair accessible routes, ramps, grab bars in bathrooms, and wide door openings as per accessibility guidelines.
